name: Dool Dos Game Install Maker
short_description:
Dool Dos Game Install Maker Pro

v5.28.5.2012

With this new version there are many fixes. Its a massive update.

[GUI Update]

A whole new GUI has been done. Its more easyer to user and
understand.

Able to use JPG/BMP/PNG for installer pictures.

[Bug Fixes]

Programme is now done in x86 or x64. Depending on your OS
it will install either the 64bit or 32bit programme.

Innosetup v5.5.0 is being used.

Included FreeDOS v1.1 Base Command Line Tools.

Dos and Win 3.x drivers still included.

[Removed]

Apple OSX App maker.
